title: ValueToKey Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for ValueToKey transformation. Extracts fields from the value and uses them as the key.

fields.description: Comma-separated list of field names to extract from the value and use as the key.
fields.title: fields

defaultSnippets.label: ValueToKey - Extract single field as key
defaultSnippets.description: Extract a single field from the value to use as the record key. Replace 'id' with your actual field name.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ValueToKey** - Extract a single field from the value to use as the record key.

Replace `id` with your actual field name.

**Use case:** When records have no key but you need to extract a key from the value for partitioning or deduplication.

defaultSnippets.label: ValueToKey - Extract multiple fields as composite key
defaultSnippets.description: Extract multiple fields from the value to create a composite key. Replace field names with your actual fields.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ValueToKey** - Extract multiple fields from the value to create a composite key.

Replace field names with your actual fields.

**Use case:** Create a composite key from multiple value fields (e.g., `userId` + `timestamp` for unique identification).
